title: Genre-Centered English Writing Scaffolding Education for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Genre-based approach specialized for scientific research paper writing, combining team-based collaboration and individual feedback in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five-step argumentation structure (introduction-claim-evidence-counterargument-conclusion) to science field cases and write with 80% accuracy.
Learners revise three or more drafts of a research report based on peer feedback, achieving a score of 4 or higher (out of 5) on the evaluation rubric.
Learners collaboratively write a team research paper analyzing science experiment results in groups of three or more, accurately integrating five or more academic sources in MLA format.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
